ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Opportunity__r.Owning_Country__c = "Iceland", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "New Pan Euro", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "Marketing/B2C Consultancy", TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c < 61032.993)
